relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
many activities to get involved in! ex: campus ministry, radio, sandwiches for survival
convent close by - always a homecoming weekend called Neumannfest with bands and activities - many student activity trips
affordable, perfect school for nursing and criminal justice majors
there are 2 malls driving distance. Also, varsity games are always fun to attend if you want to stay on campus
they have great choices for dining and its always open
I live off campus, so I don't know how dorm life is.
academics are a very important role at the school, and professors are more than helpful for tutoring and pointing students in the right direction.
Join a varsity sport! its a great way to meet friends before classes begin. The sports are a great aspect of the university.

Neumann is a great college if you want something affordable, friendly, and private. It is an amazing college academically with many majors and varsity sports along with clubs and organizations to join. Although it is a small campus, students are welcoming and the campus has a great knight life.

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Eric from Willingboro, NJ 01/25/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 37 Categories Comments Campus Safety you will see campus security all over campus and there are very helpful Greek Life no greek life at this time Clubs and Activities i play basketball Great for these types of students all students that want to achieve a college degree What to do for fun there aren't a lot of activities to do on campus but you can find positive things to do Food and Dining the food is really good, i am a picky eater but always find something that i like to eat here.
